document_data.caption: The Urmbrusk House insignia.
document_data.name: Urmbrusk
document_data.mainbody: House '''Urmbrusk''' ({{Pronounce|URM|brusk|refs=}}) was a [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble family]] of [[Waterdeep]] since the mid-13{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were known as land speculators and moneylenders.
document_data.Activities: The Urmbrusks made their fortune dealing in real estate, owning many properties and also serving as an agent representing various merchants and temples that wanted to purchase a parcel of land. With their many assets, they also provided moneylending services.
document_data.Base of Operations: [[File:UrmbruskVilla-1372.png|thumb|right|270px|''The Urmbrusk villa is labeled as $46.'']] The Urmbrusk villa was located on a walled estate between the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] and the [[Street of Whispers]] in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. [[Diamond Street]] bordered the southern edge of their estate and the [[Ilzimmer]] family villa was just to the north. [[File:UrmbruskVilla.png|thumb|right|270px|''The Urmbrusk villa outlined in red, ''circa'' 1492 DR.'']]
document_data.History:
The Urmbrusk family was ennobled in the {{YearlinkName|1254}}. They were of [[Illuskan]] descent and favored [[Bane]] as their patron [[deity]]. As of 1372 DR, there were 72 family members that could claim nobility.{{Cite dragon/282/The New Adventures of Volo: The Urge to Hunt|73}}

In 1492 DR,{{WDH-time}} [[Jelenn Urmbrusk]] was one of the anonymous [[Lords of Waterdeep]]. She traded her influence with the Lords for financial assistance in getting out of debt as a result of some bad investments. She and possibly her House were beholden to the [[Zhentarim]] and ultimately [[Manshoon]] until the debts could be paid or the situation was resolved.
document_data.Members:
* [[Halam Urmbrusk]]: head of the House in 1372 DR.
* [[Anja Urmbrusk]]: Halam's consort.
* [[Chimak Urmbrusk]]: Halam's son and heir.
* [[Quarren Urmbrusk]]: head of the House in the 1460s and 1470s DR. He stepped down, went adventuring in [[Undermountain]], and his fate remained uncertain.The ''[[Halls of Undermountain]]'' adventure module leaves the fate of Quarren and Rutherford up to the DM and how the players react.
* [[Lestra Urmbrusk]]: sister of Quarren, became the effective head of the House when Quarren left.
* [[Rutherford Urmbrusk]]: son of Quarren, went to rescue his father at age 17 and his fate remained uncertain.
* [[Jelenn Urmbrusk]]: one of the Masked [[Lords of Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
